assignments.name: Assign_VG_EMEA_Incumbent_to_Account
assignments.label: Assign VG EMEA Incumbent to Account

assignments.name: Assign_VG_EMEA_Won_to_Account
assignments.label: Assign VG EMEA Won to Account

rules.name: AG4_Incumbent
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 4 OR 5) AND 6 AND 7 AND 8 AND 2 AND 3
rules.label: AG4_Incumbent

rules.name: AG2_Incumbent
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 7 OR 8) AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 2 AND 3
rules.label: AG2_Incumbent

rules.name: AG2_AG4_Incumbent
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 4 OR 5) AND 2 AND 3 AND 6 AND 7 AND 8
rules.label: AG2 AG4 Incumbent

decisions.name: Check_Billing_Code_is_Blank_or_not
decisions.label: Check Billing Code is Blank or not

rules.name: Geotabwith_Lytx
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2) OR( (5 OR 6 OR 7) AND (3 OR 4))
rules.label: Geotabwith Lytx

decisions.name: US_or_CA_or_MX_or_EMEA
decisions.label: US or CA or MX or EMEA

Flow.description: GTMS-29163-Renewal Opportunities - remove Reason and Sub Reason on Com Intel Closed Lost

formulas.name: CompetitorName
formulas.expression: IF(NOT(ISBLANK({!CE_Competitor_Name})), {!CE_Competitor_Name}, IF(NOT(ISBLANK({!CS_Competitor_Name})), {!CS_Competitor_Name}, IF(NOT(ISBLANK({!AG_Competitor_Name})), {!AG_Competitor_Name}, IF(NOT(ISBLANK({!CM_Competitor_Name})), {!CM_Competitor_Name}, IF(NOT(ISBLANK({!VG_Competitor_Name})), {!VG_Competitor_Name}, null)))))

formulas.description: Check whether the Opportunity is webstore or not
formulas.name: WebStore

Flow.label: Closed Lost
